config.name: vm.migrationQuantity
config.description: A value that defines how many vm can be migrated in parallel when putting a KVM host into maintenance mode.

config.name: migrate.autoConverge
config.description: Enable auto converge during live migration.

config.name: migrate.xbzrle
config.description: Enable xbzrle compress will speed up live migration under write-frequently workload.

config.name: reservedCpu
config.description: The CPU capacity reserved on all KVM hosts. ZStack KVM agent is a python web server that needs some CPU capacity to run, this value reserve a portion of CPU for the agent as well as other host applications. The value can be overriden by system tag on individual host, cluster and zone level

config.name: reservedMemory
config.description: The memory capacity reserved on all KVM hosts. ZStack KVM agent is a python web server that needs some memory capacity to run. this value reserves a portion of memory for the agent as well as other host applications. The value can be overriden by system tag on individual host, cluster and zone level

config.name: dataVolume.maxNum
config.description: Max number of data volumes allowed to attach to single KVM instance

config.name: host.syncLevel
config.description: The number of parallel commands that can be executed on KVM host. A big number may put a host in heavy workload in a busy system. The value must be greater than zero

config.name: host.snapshot.syncLevel
config.description: The number of parallel commands of take snapshot call. A big number may put a host in heavy workload in a busy system. The value must be greater than zero

config.name: vm.createConcurrency
config.description: The number of VMs that can be created concurrently on KVM host.

config.name: host.DNSCheckList
config.description: DNS or IP check list. When adding a KVM host, if all DNS/IP in the list are failed to ping, the adding host will fail.

config.name: host.DNSCheckAliyun
config.description: DNS or IP check list. When adding a KVM host, if all DNS/IP in the list are failed to ping, the adding host will fail.

config.name: host.DNSCheck163
config.description: DNS or IP check list. When adding a KVM host, if all DNS/IP in the list are failed to ping, the adding host will fail.

config.name: redhat.liveSnapshotOn
config.description: when set to true, enable the live volume snapshot on RedHat series OS if the libvirt and QEMU versions match the requirement

config.name: vmSyncOnHostPing
config.description: whether to sync VM states from hosts when host ping tasks execute

config.name: vm.cacheMode
config.description: disk cache optoin:none,writethrough,writeback

config.name: vm.cpuMode
config.description: the cpu mode option, which could be used to enable nested virtualization, options are [none, host-model, host-passthrough, Haswell, Haswell-noTSX, Broadwell, Broadwell-noTSX, SandyBridge, IvyBridge, Conroe, Penryn, Nehalem, Westmere, Opteron_G1, Opteron_G2, Opteron_G3, Opteron_G4]. none: not use nested virtualization; host-model/host-passthrough will enable nested virtualization. When using host-passthrough, VM will see same CPU model in Host /proc/cpuinfo. When using host-model or host-passthrough, VM migration might be failed, due to mismatched CPU model. To use nested virtualization, user need to do some pre-configuration. Firstly, the /sys/module/kvm_intel/parameters/nested should be set as 'Y'; Secondly, the /usr/libexec/qemu-kvm binary should support nested feature as well.

config.name: checkHostCpuModelName
config.description: whether check host cpu model name when migrate vm

config.name: ignoreMsrs
config.description: whether set ignore_msrs for kvm module

config.name: testSshPortOpenTimeout
config.description: the total timeout to test if host's ssh port ready when reconnecting hosts, in seconds

config.name: testSshPortOnConnectTimeout
config.description: use with testSshPortOpenTimeout, the connect timeout launching a socket connection to hosts' ssh port, in seconds

config.name: restartagentwhenfakedead
config.description: restart agent directly if it might be fake dead

config.name: auto.set.vm.nic.multiqueue
config.description: auto set vm nic multiqueue, set nic queue number based on number of vm cpu cores when platform is linux

config.name: kvmagent.allow.ports
config.description: tcp or udp ports allowed by kvmagent, udp port start with 'u' like 'u67', port range can be like this: 1100:1200, multiple port or port range can be separated by ”,“

config.name: enable.host.tcp.connection.check
config.description: Enable host connection check offered by tcp detection.

config.name: connection.server.update.interval
config.description: Interval for tcp server update its heartbeat time.

config.name: host.connection.check.interval
config.description: Interval to check if sockets from host are out of date.

config.name: enable.vm.migration.host.cpu.function.check
config.description: Check whether the CPU function of the dstHost is compatible with the CPU function of the srcHost.

config.name: redirect.vm.log.to.file
config.description: Redirect vm console log to file
